title: 50 Years of Commitment to Christ: My Mother’s Story of Faith
description:
#christmas #advent #testimony #cslewis #narnia #elephant #jesusmovement 
On December 9th 1972 my Mother decided to commit her life to following Jesus. Here she shares her story with her children and grandchildren.
